From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


Upcoming film by Nikkhil Advani


VedaaPosterDirected byNikkhil AdvaniWritten byAseem AroraProduced by
Monisha Advani

CountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Vedaa is an upcoming Indian Hindi-language action drama film directed by Nikkhil Advani and produced by Zee Studios, Emmay Entertainment and JA Entertainment. The film stars John Abraham, Sharvari Wagh, Tamannaah Bhatia and Abhishek Banerjee.[1][2] Inspired by true events, it is scheduled to release on 12 July 2024.[3][4]


Synopsis[edit]
Vedaa depicts the bravery of one person challenging a draconian system in an uprising. It follows a young woman's fight for justice, guided by a man who becomes her ally.

Cast[edit]

John Abraham
Sharvari Wagh as Vedaa
Tamannaah Bhatia
Abhishek Banerjee
Ashish Vidyarthi
Production[edit]
The filming began on 20 June 2023 in Rajasthan.[3][5] The shoot was wrapped up in Kashmir in December 2023.[6]

Marketing[edit]
The first look poster was released on 7 February 2024.[4] The teaser trailer of the film was unveiled on 19 March 2024.[7]

Release[edit]
The film is scheduled to release worldwide on 12 July 2024.[1]
